item.title: Isotope Visual Layouts Pro - caching improvements
item.description: I’ve made a small change to Isotope Visual Layouts Pro and this directly improves caching and website performance. Isotope Visual Layouts Pro will shortly get a version bump and include a Transient to store the WordPress database query for 1 hour. The transient cache is also cleared when a new post is published.

item.title: Isotope Visual Layouts lite new version out now
item.description: Isotope Visual Layouts lite, my free WordPress plugin which adds animated grid layouts to your website has been updated. What’s New in Version 3.0 Introduces Metro UI CSS to replace my own custom code Updates Isotope jQuery to latest version

item.title: DBC Backup 2 - minor update
item.description: DBC Backup 2 my WordPress plugin to safely backup your website has had a minor update. DBC Backup 2 build 2.3.25 has just been published to the WordPress Plugin repository and you can update now. Features / What’s New in DBC Backup 2 build 2.3.25 Fixes - a problem where the settings link didn’t work from the WordPress Installed Plugins page New - help pulldown has been added to the plugin setting page.

item.title: DBC Backup 2 new version is ready for you
item.description: DBC Backup 2 is a WordPress plugin that creates backups of your database. DBC Backup 2 has just been update to v2.3.24. DBC Backup 2 has been completely redesigned and looks great as part of WordPress 3.8. What’s new in DBC Backup 2 The latest version of DBC Backup 2 includes a number of significant changes Support for PHP 5.x - resolves issue which required a manual work around / blocked importing backup files Support for MySQL 5.

item.title: DBC Backup 2 - v2.3 what's coming
item.description: The next version of DBC Backup 2 is just around the corner - I’ve held it back to better test the backup files and tinker with the admin panel. So What’s in DBC Backup 2 v2.3? Key features of this version are Support for SQL server 5.5 and up Removes annoying debug log errors Transitions from mysql to mysqli Admin panel now has a default save location and creates a Backup folder inside WP-Content directory.

item.title: DBC Backup 2 - new version on the way updated for MySQL 5.6 and latest WordPress
item.description: DBC Backup 2 my WordPress plugin to safely back-up your database is getting an massive update. This will add support for the latest MySQL server version 5.6 and is currently in test. DBC Backup 2 v2.3 is being tested with the latest versions of MySQL server and WordPress. It has been tested to ensure users can import and recover from their backup files. About DBC Backup 2 DBC Backup 2 is the WordPress plugin that you want behind the scenes - it safely and easily backs up your WordPress database, posts, settings and comments.

item.title: Isotope Visual Layouts with Infinite Scroll
item.description: Isotope Visual Layouts Pro is getting an update … and it’s one that a few of you have been asking for. Isotope Visual Layouts Pro 1.9 is currently in testing and it will include a shortcode for Infinite Scroll. I’m also making it safe to use on any page or post so you can really have different layouts (like one with infinite scroll and one with filtrify) This will be the ‘last’ update for Isotope Visual Layouts Pro … I’m working on something hotter with sorting and drag n drop.

item.title: DBC Backup 2 updated for WordPress 3.6
item.description: A new version of DBC Backup 2 my WordPress plugin to automatically backup your website has been released. This version has been tested to support WordPress 3.6 and is available to download now. What’s new in DBC Backup 2 v2.2 Minor changes to the Settings Page for the plugin, that should make it easier to use. FIXED - a few bugs TESTED - on WordPress 3.6

item.title: How to disable Jetpack WordPress plugins
item.description: Enabling and Disabling Jetpack for WordPress individual plugins presented a bit of a challenge recently. Not having used Jetpack before, I thought it time to try out this collection of plugins developed and maintained by Automattic over the past 4 weeks. I’ve discovered that Jetpack is a feature rich collection of plugins but I seriously doubled-up on plugins doing the same job. I didn’t need Google Analytics as well as WordPress Stats.

item.title: Visual Layouts Pro
item.description: I’ve just finished work on the first release of my WordPress plugin Visual Layouts Pro — this features the awesome Freetile jQuery plugin for a responsive visual grid layout. Visual Layouts Pro, like my other plugins, offers the best features for creating a grid layout framework for your WordPress site – without needing to change your theme! Key Features Visual Layouts WordPress plugin Uses Twitter Bootstrap CSS and grid framework Shortcode for including the excerpt Pagination Works on any post, page or custom post type Options to include featured images – image and text, or text only.

item.description: Isotope Visual Layouts Pro plugin introduces a click to enlarge feature for box items that are part of the grid layout. But if you’d like to add toggleClass to your Isotope WordPress project, then you might like this.

item.title: Visual Layouts for WordPress turns Pro and gets Twitter Bootstrap
item.description: Visual Layouts is the alternative, responsive, animated, grid layout WordPress plugin. It’s similar to adding isotope and masonry jQuery. Visual Layouts for WordPress is another way that you can change your website without changing your theme. Now Visual Layouts is turning Pro and the first feature I’ll show off is integration with Twitter Bootstrap CSS. I think that Twitter Bootstrapis an awesome solution for anyone wanting to use good web design concepts – of course, the internet might be pretty ‘bland’ if we all used this framework.

item.title: Thank you 2000+ downloads of DBC Backup 2 for WordPress
item.description: I want to say ‘Thank You’ to all of you who have downloaded and installed DBC Backup 2. Over the weekend, plugin downloads rose above 2000. DBC Backup 2 makes it easy to safely backup your WordPress SQL database to a folder on your web server. It’s a unique solution which also includes regular, scheduled backups so that you can have a daily, weekly or monthly backup.

item.title: Freetile Visual Post Layouts a plugin WordPress
item.description: Today I’ve been reading up on Freetilea jQuery project by Yannisfor visual layouts similar to what I’ve done with Isotope Visual Post Layouts. Freetile is a plugin for jQuery that enables the organization of webpage content in an efficient, dynamic and responsive layout. It can be applied to a container element and it will attempt to arrange it’s children in a layout that makes optimal use of screen space, by “packing” them in a tight arrangement.

item.title: 19 of the best WordPress Plugins to use with your Multisite Network (or What Plugins Im Using)
item.description: I’ve been running WordPress as a multisite network and I often get asked about what are the best plugins for WordPress. Everyone has their opinion. I’ve listed the plugins which are network activated and grouped them in some meaningful manner for web marketers and development people. WordPress is one of the worlds’ most popular website and blogging tools and it’s latest version makes it easier to manage the look of your website.
